cz.syntea.xdef.util

Class XCompose

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.util.XCompose

  • public class XCompose
extends java.lang.Object
    Process the XML file with the X-definition in the construction mode. Also provides main method for calling the program from command line. (see main(String[]))

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean compose(java.io.File sourceFile, java.io.File[] xdefFiles, java.lang.String xDefName, java.lang.String rootNS, java.lang.String rootName, java.io.File outFile, java.lang.String encoding, ReportWriter repw)
      Compose xml file with given definition.
      static boolean compose(java.io.File sourceFile, java.io.File outFile, java.lang.String encoding, ReportWriter repw)
      Compose xml file from source with given definition.
      static void main(java.lang.String... args)
      Validation of pool ox X-definitions.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • compose

        public static boolean compose(java.io.File sourceFile,
                              java.io.File outFile,
                              java.lang.String encoding,
                              ReportWriter repw)
        Compose xml file from source with given definition.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - The file with source XML.
        outFile - The file where the result will be created.
        encoding - The charset name of output encoding.
        repw - Report writer.
        Returns:
        true if result was composed.

      • compose

        public static boolean compose(java.io.File sourceFile,
                              java.io.File[] xdefFiles,
                              java.lang.String xDefName,
                              java.lang.String rootNS,
                              java.lang.String rootName,
                              java.io.File outFile,
                              java.lang.String encoding,
                              ReportWriter repw)
        Compose xml file with given definition.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - The file with XML.
        xdefFiles - Array of files with definitions.
        xDefName - Name of definition.
        rootNS - namespace of result root element or null.
        rootName - qualified name of result root element.
        outFile - The file where the result will be created.
        encoding - The charset name of output encoding.
        repw - Report writer.
        Returns:
        true if result was composed.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
        Validation of pool ox X-definitions. This method is possible to invoke from command line.
        Parameters:
        args - Array of strings containing command line arguments.

        [-d defList] [-x xDefName] [-l logFile] [-e encoding] -o outFile [-n rootNameSpace] [-r rootName] -i xmlFile

        • -d defList - list of X-definition files
        • -x xDefName - X-definition name
        • -l logFile - log file
        • -e encoding - output file encoding
        • -o outFile - output file
        • -n rootNameSpace - root namespace
        • -r rootName - root name
        • -i xmlFile - input XML file
